Lord rebellions
Enable rebellions depending on lord relationship.
Average amount of kingdom fiefs is enough to rebel
A clan has a reason to rebel when amount of its fiefs >= amount of kingdom fiefs / number of kingdom non-mercenary clans.
Minimal amount of kingdom fiefs to rebel
A clan has a reason to rebel when amount of its fiefs >= specified number. The amount of fiefs counts like this: 2 per town, 1 per castle, 0 per village.
Daily chance to rebel when a clan is ready
1 - start a rebellion as soon as possible. 0 - never.
Settlement rebellions
Enable rebellions depending on settlement loyalty. Build in game rebellion mechanic. By default is inactive probably for a reason. So use it at your own risk.
Start loyalty threshold
Loyalty threshold where a rebellion begins. May not be greater than end loyalty threshold.
End loyalty threshold
Loyalty threshold where a rebellion stops. May not be lesser than start loyalty threshold.
Relation thresholds
Friendship threshold
Relation threshold where heroes become friends. May not be lesser than hostility threshold.
Hostility threshold
Relation threshold where heroes become enemies. May not be greater than friendship threshold.
Relation changes
For rebel clan with the ruler
Relation change between a clan and the ruler as the result of rebellion.
For rebel clan with friend vassals of the ruler
Relation change between a clan and friend vassals of the ruler as the result of rebellion.
For rebel clan with enemy vassals of the ruler
Relation change between a clan and enemy vassals of the ruler as the result of rebellion.
For rebel clan with other vassals of the ruler
Relation change between a clan and other vassals of the ruler as the result of rebellion.
For rulers of united kingdoms
Relation change between two rulers as the result of union of their kingdoms.
For ruler and supporting clan
Relation change between the ruler of a weak kingdom and a supporting clan that joined the kingdom.
Keep empty kingdoms
Allows to keep empty kingdoms unremoved for compatibility with other mods. Separatist empty kingdoms will be removed anyway.
Keep original kindom wars
Allows to keep all original kingdom wars for a new rebel kingdom.
Keep separatist banner colors
Allows to keep separatist banners unchanged for compatibility with other mods.
Same banner colors for all separatists
Not works if you choose to keep separatist banner colors.
